uma inovação para época gigantesca nos jogos de puzzle e influenciou muitos jogos do mesmo estilo

This is one of my favorite games. I love the puzzles and the story. I also love that when you've played the game there's a whole coop game to play. 
I also love that when you've played the single player and coop stories, you can endlessly play custom made levels other people made! This game is a must-have for puzzle lovers!

imma be biased here; I like this game more than the first game because of the nostalgia I had with it. sure, it may not be as good as the first one in terms of writing, but not only does this game not fix what wasn't broken, but it also expands upon what you know from the first game. and honestly, it's one of my favorite childhood games from 2011.

Awesome game. It's definitely worth it. You can complete the campaign rather quickly, however, there's also Online mode, which has a lot of new areas and you can also new maps from the Workshop, making this game even more playable than ever. I recommend you getting this game with a friend so you can enjoy it together, or you can also play Splitscreen, though I'm personally not a huge fan of it.

Best game

This is one of the first story based games that I've played all the way through, and that's for a reason. The story manages to be engaging, thorough, and often hilarious, while for the most part lingering on in the background of actual gameplay, but you still get the full picture by the end. The gameplay itself is fantastic, the game introduces concept after concept after concept, but they never feel overbearing and all of them blend seamlessly with one another to create some genuinely thought-provoking puzzles. A word of advice though, if you're stuck on a puzzle, keep going, because there is at least one answer to all of them, and finding it yourself is a fantastic feeling. 10/10
